QuestData.Title: Artisan's Supply: Draconium Sickle
QuestData.Description:
You look like someone with nothing to do. How's about employment?
I have a crafting order to fill for the Artisan's Consortium for a draconium sickle. Now I could easily take care of this, but as an apprentice I think it makes more sense for you to take this one on.
Craft the sickle and bring it to the Ruby Lifeshrine, a draenei named Haephesta will pay you for it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver a Draconium Sickle to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver a Draconium Sickle to Haephesta at the Ruby Lifeshrine.

Objectives.Objective: Deliver a Draconium Sickle to Haephesta
